entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
